title: Giro d’Italia Stage 4: Jonathan Milan Wins Wild Sprint, Pogačar Avoids Trouble in Dangerous Finale
content:
Biniam Girmay crashes out and breakaway reeled in late to set up hectic finale over Capo Mele on the Italian Riviera.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 4: Jonathan Milan Wins Wild Sprint, Pogačar Avoids Trouble in Dangerous Finale on Velo.
author: ahood
